title: 'I’m now backing Boris to bring Brexit to a conclusion' - Telegraph readers on this week's top stories
text:
While the nation was poised to watch the coming together of two of the most influential minds in politics this week, it was Coleen Rooney and Rebeka Vardy who stole the limelight from Boris Johnson and Leo Varadkar.

The battle of the WAGs, #WAGathaChristie, the gift that keeps on giving; whatever you make of it, you’ll struggle to find a social media timeline that wasn’t overcome by the real-life embodiment of Footballers’ Wives. Some Telegraph readers have even suggested that the British Government should now turn to Mrs Rooney to guide their fruitless attempts to solve the backstop conundrum.

Back in the world of Brexit, Boris Johnson was buoyed by the news that Leo Varadkar could “see a...
description: While the nation was poised to watch the coming together of two of the most influential minds in politics this week, it was Coleen Rooney and Rebeka Vardy who stole the limelight from Boris Johnson and Leo Varadkar.
